answers.answer: The Dopomoha platform is a Commit Global solution designed to support refugees. It provides information and resources related to housing, education, health, and transportation, and includes a call center. It also offers solutions like "Law made simple" to help citizens understand their rights and obligations, and "PTSD Help" for managing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. Additionally, the platform provides guidance on staying safe, addressing human trafficking, offering a guide for emergencies or war, and a map of shelters in Romania.
answers.bResponse: The Dopomoha platform is a Commit Global solution designed to support refugees. It provides information and resources related to housing, education, health, and transportation, and includes a call center. It also offers solutions like "Law made simple" to help citizens understand their rights and obligations, and "PTSD Help" for managing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. Additionally, the platform provides guidance on staying safe, addressing human trafficking, offering a guide for emergencies or war, and a map of shelters in Romania. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/stay-safe

answers.answer: Dopomoha provides support services covering Housing, Education, Health, and Transportation. It offers specific solutions like "Law made simple" to help citizens understand their rights and obligations, and "PTSD Help" as a free assistant for managing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. The platform also provides information on staying safe, including guidance on human trafficking (how to reduce vulnerability, child safety, and reporting contacts) and a "Guide for what to do in case of emergency or war" with instructions on preparation and action. Additionally, it offers a map of shelters in Romania and Bucharest, and general support through a call center and for various cities like Brașov, Brăila, Constanța, Galați, Iași, Oradea, Suceava, Sibiu, Cluj-Napoca, and Timișoara.

For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/stay-safe

answers.answer: Information and resources about human trafficking can be found under the "Stay safe" section. This includes details on how to reduce vulnerability to human trafficking, learn more about child safety, and find contacts to report in case of suspicion of human trafficking.

answers.answer: Yes, there is a guide available titled “What to do in case of emergency or war.” It is created by the Ukrainian authorities and provides detailed instructions on how to prepare for emergencies and how to act if they occur.
